title: Where can I get free music for YouTube? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hi friends, most of People are asking about free copyright music its very easy to find on youtube like “youtube audio library “ is all free music to use in your app or any other content and all music videos in which owner allowed people to use his created music in their content and you can see in the description of any video that if the music is made as “ common creative “means you can reuse this music and you are not facing any copyright strike from anyone I hope answer helps the people who are searching for free copy right music
